list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Implement ProductController for managing merchant's products
This commit introduces the ProductController class, which provides endpoints for managing products associated with merchants. The controller includes the following functionality:
- GET /restapi/merchants/{merchantId}/products: List all products for a specific merchant. - GET /restapi/merchants/{merchantId}/products/high-priced: List high-priced products for a specific merchant. - POST /restapi/merchants/{merchantId}/products: Create a new product for a merchant. - PUT /restapi/merchants/{merchantId}/products: Update product information for a merchant. - DELETE /restapi/merchants/{merchantId}/products/{productId}: Delete a product for a merchant.
The ProductController works in conjunction with the ProductService to handle product-related operations.

task.summary:
feat: Implement MerchantController for managing merchants
This commit introduces the MerchantController class, which includes endpoints for managing merchants. The controller provides the following functionality:
- GET /binarfud/merchants: List all merchants. - GET /binarfud/merchants/by-location: Filter merchants by location. - POST /binarfud/merchants: Create a new merchant. - PUT /binarfud/merchants/{id}: Update merchant status. - DELETE /binarfud/merchants/{id}: Delete a merchant.
The controller works in conjunction with the MerchantService to handle merchant-related operations.

feat: Implement ProductController for managing merchant's products

The ProductController works in conjunction with the ProductService to handle product-related operations.
